alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 12:57AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lewis and northeastern Oswego Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1256 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Redfield, or 13 miles north of Camden, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Redfield, Highmarket, Richland, Williamstown, Orwell, Port Leyden, Altmar, Constableville, Osceola, West Leyden, Salmon River Reservoir, Kasoag, Mohawk Hill, North Osceola, Swancott Mill and Talcottville. This includes Interstate 81 near exit 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
